item.title: Champion Stadium Packable Jacket, Lightweight Water and Wind Resistant Windbreaker
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Here’s a gotta-have pullover jacket that has endless uses in your weekend wardrobe. This lightweight, effortless windbreaker from Champion is perfect to toss in your weekend tote, to keep in your golf bag, or with your workout gear. Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:47:26 UTC – Details)


Here’s a gotta-have pullover jacket that has endless uses in your weekend wardrobe. This lightweight, effortless windbreaker from Champion is perfect to toss in your weekend tote, to keep in your golf bag, or with your workout gear. Wind-and water-resistant, this ultra-light style pulls over your head with a half zipper and features a handy scuba-style neckline and hood with bungee cord closure. Better yet, it folds right up into its own front zip pocket, creating a neat little pouch that fits anywhere, even a briefcase. This packable jacket can be easily layered over a sweatshirt or sweater. And it’s detailed with elasticized cuffs to keep out wind and rain, plus a bungee-cord hem to adjust as you choose. And maybe the best thing about it is that it’s made of 100% recycled polyester so you can feel good about wearing it. When you wear this packable windbreaker jacket, you’ll proudly display the Champion logo on the chest and the iconic “C” logo appliquéd at the left cuff.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 22 x 18 x 1 inches; 8.68 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ V1012
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 15, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Champion
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B078GPYT9H

Imported
Polyester lining
Zipper closure
Machine Wash
WIND- AND WATER-RESISTANT – A special waterproof coating will come in handy whenever the weather takes a turn.
LIGHT AND PACKABLE – Folds into its own zip pocket to form a neat pouch you can tuck away anywhere.

4.5

Even better, vapor technology wicks away moisture from skin to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:12 UTC – Details)


For the high performance you need in a sports bra, look to Champion, the folks who invented the sports bra. This racerback compression sports bra offers all the support you need with comfortable chafe-free styling from the SmoothTec® under band. Even better, vapor technology wicks away moisture from skin to keep you cool and dry. The ultra-smooth fabric further reduces chafing. And the T-shaped racerback lets your skin breathe as you work out. This sleek performance sports bra is detailed with the Champion C Logo on the left chest and at the back band.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.08 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ B9504
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 9, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Champion Women’s Activewear
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00T3IOS7G

Pull-On closure
Machine Wash
COMPRESSION FABRIC – A thoughtful blend of support and comfort.
NO CHAFING OR RUBBING – The SmoothTec under band is all about comfortable support, making this sports bra a great partner in your workout.
KEEP COOL AND DRY – Vapor technology wicks away moisture from skin to keep you cool and dry.
T-BACK STYLING – Helps to cool your shoulders and back.

item.title: Champion Men’s, Classic Cotton Jersey Athletic Shorts, C Logo, 9″ Inseam
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) For comfort and quality in an easy essential, rely on Champion’s® classic, cotton jersey gym shorts. Wear them as training shorts, as running shorts, or as running-around-with-the-kids shorts. With all the comfort of your favorite tee, they’re knit of soft, lighter weight cotton that’s US-grown, traceable and produced using 2-5 ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $10.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:14 UTC – Details)


For comfort and quality in an easy essential, rely on Champion’s® classic, cotton jersey gym shorts. Wear them as training shorts, as running shorts, or as running-around-with-the-kids shorts. With all the comfort of your favorite tee, they’re knit of soft, lighter weight cotton that’s US-grown, traceable and produced using 2-5 times less water. These basic jersey gym shorts are all about comfort, detailed with an elastic drawcord waistband, with three-needle stitching for a made to last fit. Deep side-seam pockets conveniently hold your phone, ID, and keys. The long, relaxed silhouette has a 9” Inseam that hits just at the knee. Keep these effortless cotton knit athletic shorts close by for serious training, movie night on the sofa, and everything in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13 x 8 x 1 inches; 6.72 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 85653
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 23, 2013
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Champion Men’s Athletic
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00AKSCXBQ

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
THE COMFORT OF COTTON – These men’s shorts are made from lighter weight, traceable US-grown cotton produced using 2-5 times less water.
WEAR EVERYWHERE – From morning workouts to weekend getaways, these jersey shorts go anywhere.
THE WAIST THAT WORKS FOR YOU – Elastic waistband with drawcord lets you adjust the fit.

item.title: The Undefeated Athlete: How to be a Champion in Any Sport
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Undefeated Athlete: How to Be a Champion in Any Sport is a resource for sports-based youth development. The book is designed to provide amateur athletes in all sports with self-help/motivational information intended to help take their overall performance to the next level. In addition, knowledge is shared on how ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:30:29 UTC – Details)

The Undefeated Athlete: How to Be a Champion in Any Sport is a resource for sports-based youth development. The book is designed to provide amateur athletes in all sports with self-help/motivational information intended to help take their overall performance to the next level. In addition, knowledge is shared on how an athlete can navigate their sports career by effectively using their mind, the most crucial element of any athlete that aspires to be “elite.”

The words UNDEFEATED and CHAMPION were chosen as a part of the title for a specific reason. The objective is for the amateur athlete to learn that by having an undefeated mindset with the heart of a champion – they’ll be better prepared to handle obstacles they might face and that many of the principles they learn in sports will benefit them in future endeavors in life.

Athletes will learn the keys to successfully:

– Becoming a leader on a team

– Developing more discipline

– Replacing negative thinking with more positivity

– Dealing with making mistakes

– Preventing and handling injuries

– Committing to better eating habits as an athlete

– Learning the importance of a good sleep routine

– Improving their relationships with coaches and teammates

*For young athletes ages 10-18 and parents/coaches who want to help young athletes develop a “winning mindset” for sports and beyond*

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BL5QNTCZ
Publisher ‏ : ‎ Michael McCree (November 17, 2022)
Language ‏ : ‎ English
Paperback ‏ : ‎ 146 pages
ISBN-13 ‏ : ‎ 979-8218072698
Item Weight ‏ : ‎ 7.2 ounces
Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 0.33 x 9 inches

5
